string.value: #b#@1012003:##k in #b#m100000000##k needs help investigating the incident. Let's talk to him.

At the time of the attack, the suspect dropped something, though he couldn't remember what it was since he was knocked unconscious.

He suggests you go to #b#m104040002##k and investigate the area. He says the monsters nearby may have consumed it, so you might be able to find some sort of clue if you continue to hunt them.

Report back to #b#@1012003:##k in #b#m100000000##k upon completion.
You heard why #b#p1012003##k in #b#m100000000##k was so angry, and you've cleared the misunderstanding. In any case, the suspect still remains a mystery.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 3,000 Able to proceed to 'Heading Over to The Nautilus!' as next quest.
Anyway, I want to find out who it was that attacked me. Will you help?

I remember the map where I got attacked. I think the suspect even dropped something. But, of course, I don't remember what or who because I was knocked unconscious. If it's still not there, I'm pretty sure one of the monsters ate the item that the suspect dropped.
You'll be able to gather some clues in #b#m104040002##k if you hunt the monsters living there.
Are you trying to get me fired up or what?!
Ah, I just knew the monsters devoured it! Nice job.
To tell you a little bit about this Iron Fragment...Well, I must take a closer look at it. Why don't you rest for a bit while I try to figure it out?
